#!/bin/bash -v

yum --security update --assumeyes
##############################################
# Change Name of server to match new hostname

##############################################

usermod -a -G aix jowe6212
usermod -a -G aix bvar0048
usermod -a -G aix kmcm0238
usermod -a -G aix vkum1134
usermod -a -G aix klow3697
usermod -a -G aix ssil0263
##############################################
# Install AWS Kinesis Agent
# https://docs.aws.amazon.com/streams/latest/dev/writing-with-agents.html 
##############################################
yum install -y aws-kinesis-agent
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1/AWSFiles
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1/AWSFiles/C003QNRD.PMPBMUPF
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1/AWSFiles/C003QNRD.PMPNBBPF
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1/AWSFiles/C003QNRD.PMPSYPTF

mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1/AWSFiles/C003QNRD.PMPZQXPF
mkdir /usr/MIMIXShare54/kernel/targetfiles/EDMM1/AWSFiles/C003QNRD.PMPZQYPF
##############################################
# Splunk - Log Monitoring 
# http://splunk.na.sysco.net/en-US/app/cloud_pricing/search 
# Search: index=cp_metrics_nonprod sourcetype=cdc_kinesis 
##############################################
mkdir /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/apps/kinesis_agent
mkdir /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/apps/kinesis_agent/local
chmod -c -R 777 /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/apps/kinesis_agent
chown -R splunk /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/apps/kinesis_agent
tee /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/apps/kinesis_agent/local/inputs.conf <<-EOF
[monitor:///var/log/aws-kinesis-agent/aws-kinesis-agent.log]
disabled = false
followTail = true
index = cp_metrics_nonprod
sourcetype = cdc_kinesis
EOF
##############################################
# Splunk - Clear Settings
##############################################
/opt/splunkforwarder/bin/splunk stop
/opt/splunkforwarder/bin/splunk clone-prep-clear-config
/opt/splunkforwarder/bin/splunk start

# TODO Copy config file #
